item.title: activation functions
item.description: Sigmoid function takes values between 0 and 1 $$ {sigmoid} = \frac {e^x} {( 1+ e^x )} $$ This is used in logistic regression. The sigmoid graph is generated by the R code provided below. Softmax function is used to calculate the probablities in multiple classes. Suppose we have a image of a digit. We want to calculate whether it is a 1, 2, 3, and so on. Softmax would provide the probablity for each of the classes.
